findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: Unprotected initializer functions
findings.description: Initializer functions are not protected from being called multiple times, potentially leading to unintended behavior.
findings.contract: Multiple contracts (IUniswapV2Pair, ERC20Upgradeable, OwnableUpgradeable, BaseToken, AntiBotBABYTOKEN)

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The 'transfer' function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function does not have any access control or validation, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the token balance.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to drain the allowance of a user.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is not protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is unprotected and can be exploited to mint tokens without proper authorization.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is not protected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: _beforeTokenTransfer function is not protected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected _afterTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The _afterTokenTransfer function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected distributeCAKEDividends function
findings.description: The distributeCAKEDividends function lacks proper access control and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized distribution of dividends.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is public and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized users to withdraw dividends.

findings.title: Unprotected _withdrawDividendOfUser function
findings.description: The _withdrawDividendOfUser function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected dividendOf function
findings.description: The dividendOf function is public and does not have any access modifiers or restrictions, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawableDividendOf function
findings.description: The withdrawableDividendOf function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawnDividendOf function
findings.description: The withdrawnDividendOf function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected accumulativeDividendOf function
findings.description: The accumulativeDividendOf function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _setBalance function
findings.description: The internal _setBalance function can be accessed directly and allows arbitrary changes to balances.
